sentences.sContent: She has recently franchised her business.
sentences.sCn: 她最近已出售了其公司的特许经营权。

synos.tran: [贸易]特权；公民权；经销权；管辖权
给…以特许（或特权）；赋予公民权

remMethod.val: fran(看作France， 法国) + chise(看作Chinese， 中国人) → 在法国的中国人也有特权 → 特许经营权

trans.tranOther: to give or sell a franchise to someone

trans.tranCn: 特许经营权； 特许总代理权； 公民权， 选举权
trans.tranOther: the legal right to vote in your country’s elections
